name: wrtc-simple-data
description: A simple Node.js library to communicate via WebRTC data channels as simple and lightweight as any possible.

scripts.build:native: npm run build && sed -i 's/wrtc from "wrtc"/wrtc from "react-native-webrtc"/' ./build/src/Connection.js
scripts.dist:build:node: npm run build:node && babel --presets es2015 -d dist/node/ build/
scripts.dist:build:native: npm run build:native && rm -rf dist/native && cp -r build dist/native
scripts.dist:node: cp README.md dist/node && cp package.json dist/node
scripts.dist:native: cp README.md dist/native && cp package.json dist/native && npm run dist:native:name
scripts.dist:native:name: sed -i 's/"wrtc-simple-data"/"wrtc-simple-data-native"/' ./dist/native/package.json
scripts.dist:build: npm run dist:build:node && npm run dist:build:native
scripts.dist: npm run dist:build && npm run dist:node && npm run dist:native
